meanings.definition: Relating to or causing the breakdown of fats
meanings.sent1: The lipolytic enzyme helped in breaking down the fat molecules.
meanings.sent2: The lipolytic properties of the medication aid in weight loss.
meanings.sent3: The lipolytic effect of the detergent on grease stains was impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to exercise daily was like a lipolytic force against her body fat.
meanings.sent5: The lipolytic action of the soap on the oily dishes was remarkable.

meanings.definition: A substance or process that breaks down fats
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a lipolytic to help with digestion.
meanings.sent2: Lipolytics are commonly used in the food industry for various purposes.
meanings.sent3: The lipolytic in the recipe made the dessert lighter and healthier.
meanings.sent4: The lipolytic worked its magic on the stubborn fat deposits.
meanings.sent5: Using lipolytics in skincare products can improve skin texture over time.
